summary:
Disables random vampire attacks in towns. Vampire and other creature attacks can still happen, though not often, in the wilderness.

My mod is eternally FREE! Here and everywhere; now and always...
descriptionHtml:
******************
DESCRIPTION
******************
Disables random vampire attacks in towns. Vampire and other creature attacks can still happen, though not often, in the wilderness.

***********
UPDATE
***********
This mod has been succeeded by this: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31088
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31088]Quazzy's Random Vampire Attacks in Towns Disabled[/url]
author: crippknottick
